actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to protect the supply of domestic timber.
short_title: Domestic Timber Supply Protection Act of 1980

summary.text: Domestic Timber Supply Protection Act of 1980 - Prohibits the Secretaries of Agriculture and the Interior from selling unprocessed timber from Federal lands which will be exported, used as a substitute for other unprocessed timber which will be exported, or obtained by persons who: (1) export unprocessed timber; (2) own land from which such timber is exported; or (3) buy such timber for export. Permits the Secretary of Agriculture, after consultation with the Secretary of the Interior and public hearings, to exempt from such prohibition specific quantities of grades and species of unprocessed timber.

titles.title: Domestic Timber Supply Protection Act of 1980
A bill to protect the supply of domestic timber.
